description: Alchemical control over acid.
name: acid alchemy

talents.info_text:
When you throw your alchemist bombs, you infuse them with explosive acid that can blind.

In addition all acid damage you do is increased by 8%, 16%, 23%, 28%, 33%.

You cannot have more than one alchemist infusion sustain active at once.
talents.name: Acid Infusion

talents.info_text:
While Acid Infusion is active, your bombs coat your golem in acid for 7, 10, 12, 13, 15 turns when they hit it.

While coated, any melee hit agaist your golem has a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance to trigger a radius 4 cone of acid towards the attacker that does 0.0 Acid damage to all caught inside. (This can only happen once per turn.)

The effects increase with your talent level and with the Spellpower and damage modifiers of your golem.
talents.name: Caustic Golem

talents.info_text:
A radius 3 pool of acid spawns at the target location, doing 41, 56, 67, 77, 86 Acid damage each turn for 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns.

All creatures caught in the mire will also suffer a 15%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% slowness effect.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Caustic Mire

talents.info_text:
Acid errupts all around your target, dealing 234, 318, 384, 439, 488 acid damage.

The acid attack is extremely distracting, and may remove up to 1, 2, 2, 3, 3 physical or mental temporary effects or mental sustains (depending on the Spell Save of the target).

The damage and chance to remove effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Dissolving Acid

description: Create and empower powerful undead minions.
name: advanced necrotic minions

talents.info_text:
Minions are only tools. You may dispose of them… Violently.

Makes the targeted minion explode for 38%, 45%, 49%, 52%, 54% of its maximum life in a radius of 1, 2, 2, 2, 3 as blight damage.

Beware! Don't get caught in the blast! (unless you know Dark Empthy: 0% chance to ignore damage)
talents.name: Undead Explosion

talents.info_text:
Combines 3 of your minions into a bone giant.

At level 1, it makes a bone giant.

At level 3, it makes a heavy bone giant.

At level 5, it makes an eternal bone giant.

At level 6, it has a 20% chance to produce a runed bone giant.

Only one bone giant can be active at any time.
talents.name: Assemble

talents.info_text:
Sacrifice a bone giant minion. Using its bones, you make a temporary shield around you that prevents any attacks from doing more than 21%, 18%, 16%, 15%, 15% of your total life.

The effect lasts 17, 21, 25, 28, 31 turns.
talents.name: Sacrifice

talents.info_text:
Each minion you summon has a chance to be a more advanced form of undead. Your chance for each type of minion is as follows:

Degenerated skeleton warrior: 43%, 22%, 9%, 0%, 0%

Skeleton warrior: 10%, 13%, 15%, 18%, 19%

Armoured skeleton warrior: 1%, 5%, 8%, 11%, 13%

Skeleton archer: 12%, 16%, 14%, 7%, 0%

Skeleton master archer: 0%, 3%, 5%, 7%, 8%

Skeleton mage: 5%, 8%, 9%, 11%, 11%

Ghoul: 17%, 11%, 7%, 3%, 0%

Ghast: 1%, 3%, 5%, 7%, 8%

Ghoulking: 0%, 2%, 4%, 7%, 8%

Vampire: 5%, 6%, 5%, 3%, 0%

Master vampire: 0%, 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%

Grave wight: 0%, 1%, 2%, 3%, 5%

Barrow wight: 0%, 0%, 2%, 3%, 5%

Dread: 0%, 2%, 4%, 5%, 7%

Lich: 0%, 0%, 2%, 3%, 5%
talents.name: Minion Mastery

description: Advanced golem operations.
name: advanced-golemancy

talents.info_text: You tap into your golem's life energies to replenish your own. Drains 403, 523, 617, 695, 765 life.
talents.name: Life Tap
require: Level 10, Mag 22; Having an Alchemist Golem
Level 11, Mag 24; Having an Alchemist Golem
Level 12, Mag 26; Having an Alchemist Golem
Level 13, Mag 28; Having an Alchemist Golem
Level 14, Mag 30; Having an Alchemist Golem

talents.info_text:
Insert a pair of gems into your golem, providing it with the gem bonuses and changing its melee attack damage type. You may remove the gems and insert different ones; this does not destroy the gems you remove.

Gem level usable: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5

Gem changing is done in the golem's inventory.
talents.name: Gem Golem

talents.info_text:
You activate a special mode of your golem, boosting its regeneration rate by 56, 73, 87, 98, 108 life per turn for 7 turns.

If your golem was dead, it is instantly brought back to life with 32%, 44%, 52%, 58%, 63% life.

While supercharged, your golem is enraged and deals 25% more damage.
talents.name: Supercharge Golem

talents.info_text:
Increases your golem's life, mana and stamina regeneration rates by 1.00, 2.00, 3.00, 4.00, 5.00.

At level 1, 3 and 5, the golem also gains a new rune slot.

Even without this talent, Golems start with three rune slots.
talents.name: Runic Golem

description: Command the arcane forces into healing and protection.
name: aegis

talents.info_text:
Imbues your body with arcane forces, reconstructing it to a default state, healing for 427, 567, 675, 767, 848 life.

The life healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Arcane Reconstruction

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with strengthening arcane forces.

Every damage shield, time shield, displacement shield, and disruption shield affecting you has its power increased by 49%, 60%, 68%, 75%, 81%.

At level 5, it also increases the duration of all shields by 1 turn.

The shield value will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shielding

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with protective arcane forces.

Each time you receive a direct heal (not a life regeneration effect), you automatically gain a damage shield equal to 56%, 62%, 66%, 68%, 70% of the heal value for 3 turns.

This will replace an existing damage shield if the new shield value and duration would be greater than or equal to the old.

The shield value will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Arcane Shield

talents.info_text:
Release arcane energies into any magical shield currently protecting you, further charging it by 77%, 90%, 101%, 109%, 117% of its max absorb value.

It will affect at most 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 shield effects.

Affected shields are: Damage Shield, Time Shield, Displacement Shield, and Disruption Shield.

The charging will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Aegis

description: Tap on the core arcane forces of the aether, unleashing devastating effects on your foes.
name: aether

talents.info_text:
You focus the aether into a spinning beam of arcane energies, doing 106, 145, 175, 200, 222 arcane damage and having 25% chance to silence the creatures it pierces.

The beam will also damage its epicenter each turn for 10% of the damage (but it will not silence).

The beam spins with incredible speed (1600%).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Aether Beam

talents.info_text:
Rupture reality to temporarily open a passage to the aether, triggering 3, 4, 4, 4, 5 random arcane explosions in the target area.

Each explosion does 129, 175, 211, 241, 268 arcane damage in radius 2, and will each trigger at one turn intervals.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Aether Breach

talents.info_text:
Fill yourself with aether forces, completely surrounding your body for 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

While active, you can only cast arcane or aether spells, your cooldown for them is divided by 3, your arcane damage is increased by 25%, your Disruption Shield can be used at any time, and your maximum mana is increased by 33%.
talents.name: Aether Avatar

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with Pure Aether, increasing all your arcane damage by 3.9%, 6.9%, 9.3%, 11%, 13% and ignoring 17%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% arcane resistance of your targets.

At level 5 it allows Aegis spells to be used while in Aether Avatar form.
talents.name: Pure Aether

description: Harness the power of the air to fry your foes.
name: air

talents.info_text:
Conjures up mana into a powerful beam of lightning, doing 86, 117, 140, 161, 179 to 257, 350, 421, 482, 536 damage

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Lightning

talents.info_text:
Invokes a forking beam of lightning doing 60, 82, 99, 113, 126 to 181, 246, 297, 340, 378 damage and forking to another target.

It can hit up to 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 targets up to 10 grids apart, and will never hit the same one twice; nor will it hit the caster.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Chain Lightning

talents.info_text:
A gentle wind circles around the caster, increasing carrying capacity by 77, 104, 126, 144, 160, defense against projectiles by 19, 27, 32, 37, 41, pin immunity by 24%, 57%, 82%, 100%, 100% and stun immunity by 12%, 28%, 41%, 51%, 61%.

At level 4 it also makes you levitate slightly above the ground, allowing you to ignore some traps.

At level 5 it also grants 8%, 15%, 22%, 29%, 35% movement speed and removes 3, 7, 11, 15, 18 fatigue.
talents.name: Feather Wind

talents.info_text:
Conjures a furious, raging lightning storm with a radius of 6 that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a random lightning bolt will hit up to 1, 3, 4, 6, 7 of your foes for 1 to 55, 75, 91, 104, 115 damage in a radius of 1.

This powerful spell will drain 1.50, 3.00, 4.50, 6.00, 7.50 mana with each hit.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Thunderstorm

description: Crush the souls of your foes to improve yourself.
name: animus

talents.info_text:
Crush and consume one of your captured souls, healing you for 427, 567, 675, 767, 848 life and restoring 142, 189, 225, 255, 282 mana.

The life and mana healed will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Consume Soul

talents.info_text:
Your hunger for souls grows ever more. When you kill a creature you rip away its animus with great force, granting you a 41%, 68%, 77%, 83%, 86% chance to gain one additional soul.

In addition you are able to store 3, 5, 7, 9, 10 more souls.
talents.name: Animus Hoarder

talents.info_text:
Try to crush the soul of your foe, doing 242, 329, 396, 453, 504 darkness damage (that can never kill the target).

If the target is left with less than 12%, 19%, 23%, 27%, 29% life you try to take control of its body.

Should this succeed the target becomes your permanent minion (unaffected by your aura) and you regain 2 souls.

Husks prossess the same abilities as they had in life (affected by Dark Empathy), are healed to full when created but can never heal or be healed by any means.

Only one husk can be controlled at any time, if this spell is cast again it will dispell the previous husk, even if no new one is created.

Bosses, other undeads and summoned creatures can not be turned into husks.

The damage and chance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Animus Purge

talents.info_text:
Crush and consume two souls to empower your next 1, 3, 4, 5, 6 spells, granting them a special effect.

Affected spells are:

  • Undeath Link: in addition to the heal a shield is created for half the heal power
  • Create Minions: allows you to summon 2 more minions
  • Assemble: allows you to summon a second bone golem
  • Invoke Darkness: becomes a cone of darkness
  • Shadow Tunnel: teleported minions will also be healed for 30% of their max life
  • Cold Flames: freeze chance increased to 100%
  • Ice Shards: each shard becomes a beam
  • Consume Soul: effect increased by 50%
talents.name: Essence of the Dead

description: Arcane studies manipulate the raw magic energies to shape them into both offensive and defensive spells.
name: arcane

talents.info_text:
Conjures up mana into a powerful bolt doing 166, 226, 272, 311, 346 arcane damage.

At level 3, it becomes a beam.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Manathrust

talents.info_text: Your mastery of magic allows you to enter a state of deep concentration, increasing your Spellpower by 7, 13, 18, 23, 27 and arcane resistance by 25%, 33%, 38%, 43%, 48%.
talents.name: Arcane Power

talents.info_text:
Creates a vortex of arcane energies on the target for 6 turns. Each turn the vortex will look for another foe in sight and fire a manathrust doing 42, 57, 68, 78, 87 arcane damage to all foes in line.

If no foes are found, the target will take 50% more arcane damage.

If the target dies, the vortex explodes, releasing all remaining damage in a radius 2 ball of arcane force.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Arcane Vortex

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with arcane forces, disrupting any attempts to harm you and instead generating mana.

Generates 1.56, 1.05, 0.65, 0.50, 0.50 mana per damage point taken (Aegis Shielding talent affects the ratio).

If your mana is brought too high by the shield, it will de-activate and the chain reaction will release a deadly arcane storm around you with radius 3 for 10 turns, dealing 10% of the damage absorbed over the sustain's duration each turn, up to a maximum of 200 total damage.

While the arcane storm rages, you also get 87%, 100%, 111%, 119%, 127% arcane resistance.

Only usable when below 25% mana.

The damage to mana ratio increases with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Disruption Shield

description: Conveyance is the school of travel. It allows you to travel faster and to track others.
name: conveyance

talents.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a small range of up to 13, 15, 17, 18, 19 grids.

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 4, 3, 2, 1, 1).

If the target area is not in line of sight, there is a chance the spell will partially fail and teleport the target randomly.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Phase Door

talents.info_text:
Teleports you randomly within a large range (110, 125, 150, 175, 200).

At level 4, it allows you to specify which creature to teleport.

At level 5, it allows you to choose the target area (radius 19, 17, 16, 15, 14).

Random teleports have a minimum range of 15.

The range will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Teleport

talents.info_text:
This intricate spell erects a space distortion around the caster that is linked to another distortion, placed around a target.

Any time the caster should take damage, there is a 47%, 55%, 62%, 70%, 77% chance that it will instead be warped by the shield and hit the designated target.

Once the maximum damage (345, 451, 533, 603, 665) is absorbed, the time runs out (14, 19, 23, 25, 25 turns), or the target dies, the shield will crumble.

The max damage the shield can absorb will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Displacement Shield

talents.info_text:
When you hit a solid surface, this spell tears down the laws of probability to make you instantly appear on the other side.

Teleports up to 16, 20, 24, 28, 30 grids.

After a successful probability travel you are left unstable, unable to do it again for a number of turns equal to 400%, 350%, 300%, 250%, 200% of the number of tiles you blinked through.

The range will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Probability Travel

description: Harness the power of the world to turn into a Deeprock Form.
name: deeprock

talents.info_text:
You call upon the very core of the world, harnessing its power to transform your body.

For 15, 17, 18, 19, 20 turns you become a Deeprock Elemental, gaining two size categories.

This increases your Physical damage by 23%, 30%, 35%, 39%, 43% and Physical damage penetration by 7.5%, 9.9%, 12%, 15%, 17%, and armour by 7, 9, 11, 12, 13.

The effects increase with spellpower.
talents.name: Deeprock Form

talents.info_text:
When you turn into a Deeprock elemental your Arcane damage is increased by 23%, 30%, 35%, 39%, 43%, Arcane damage penetration by 7.5%, 9.9%, 12%, 15%, 17% and you gain the power to invoke volcanos:

Effective talent level: 2.0, 4.0, 6.0, 8.0, 10

Use mode: Activated

Mana cost: 10

Range: 10

Cooldown: 20

Travel Speed: 200% of base

Usage Speed: Spell (100% of a turn)

Is: a spell

Description: Summons a small raging volcano for 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns. Every turn, it will fire a molten boulder towards up to 2, 4, 5, 6, 6 of your foes, dealing 31, 43, 52, 60, 66 fire and 31, 43, 52, 60, 66 physical damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Volcanic Rock

talents.info_text:
When you turn into a Deeprock elemental your Nature damage is increased by 23%, 30%, 35%, 39%, 43%, Nature damage penetration by 7.5%, 9.9%, 12%, 15%, 17% and you gain the power to throw boulders:

Effective talent level: 2.0, 4.0, 6.0, 8.0, 10

Use mode: Activated

Equilibrium cost: 5

Range: 10

Cooldown: 3

Travel Speed: instantaneous

Usage Speed: Standard (100% of a turn)

Is: a nature gift

Description: Throw a huge boulder, dealing 170, 236, 286, 328, 366 physical damage and knocking targets back 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 tiles within radius 1.

The damage will increase with your Strength.
talents.name: Boulder Rock

talents.info_text:
While in deeprock form, you become indomitable, granting you 32%, 44%, 52%, 58%, 63% resistance to cuts, poisons, diseases and stuns.

At level 5 and higher, while Deeprock Form is active, all incoming damage is applied against physical resistance instead of the normal resistance type.
talents.name: Mountainhewn

description: Divination allows the caster to sense its surroundings, and find hidden things.
name: divination

talents.info_text:
Summons an ethereal magical eye at the designated location that lasts for 14, 19, 23, 28, 32 turns.

The eye cannot be seen or attacked by other creatures, and possesses magical vision that allows it to see any creature in a 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 range around it.

It does not require light to do so, but it cannot see through walls.

Casting the eye does not take a turn.

Only one arcane eye can exist at any given time.

At level 4, if cast on a creature it will follow it until it expires, or until the creature dies.

At level 5, it will place a magical marker on the creatures, negating invisibility and stealth effects.
talents.name: Arcane Eye

talents.info_text:
You focus your senses, getting information from moments in the future.

Improves your capacity to see invisible foes by +30, +41, +49, +57, +63, to see through stealth by +13, +17, +21, +24, +27, and to perform a critical spell cast by +7%, +10%, +12%, +14%, +16%.

The effects will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Keen Senses

talents.info_text: Form a map of your surroundings in your mind in a radius of 12, 15, 17, 19, 21
talents.name: Vision

talents.info_text:
Echoes of the future flash before your eyes, allowing you to sense some incoming attacks.

If the attack is not physical, you will erect a temporary shield that reduces all damage of this type by 26%, 32%, 37%, 40%, 44% for 5 turns.

This effect can only happen once every 5 turns, and happens before damage is taken.

The bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Premonition

description: Harness the power of the earth to protect and destroy.
name: earth

talents.info_text:
Fire a powerful beam of stone-shaterring force, digging out any walls in its path up to 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.

The beam also affect any creatures in its path, dealing 219, 298, 359, 411, 456 physical damage to all.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Pulverizing Auger

talents.info_text:
The caster's skin grows as hard as stone, granting a 15, 20, 24, 28, 31 bonus to Armour.

Each time you are hit in melee, you have a 59%, 82%, 88%, 91%, 93% chance to reduce the cooldown of an Earth or Stone spell by 2 (this effect can only happen once per turn).

The bonus to Armour will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Stone Skin

talents.info_text:
Conjures a mudslide, dealing 181, 246, 297, 340, 378 physical damage in a radius of 4, 6, 7, 8, 9. Any creatures caught inside will be knocked back.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Mudslide

talents.info_text:
Entomb yourself in a wall of stone for 9, 12, 14, 16, 18 turns.

At level 4, it becomes targetable.

Any hostile creature caught in the radius will also suffer 181, 246, 297, 340, 378 physical damage.

Duration and damage will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Stone Wall

description: Infuse arcane forces into your shield.
name: eldritch shield

talents.info_text:
Channel eldritch forces into a melee attack, hitting the target with your weapon and shield for 201%, 321%, 438%, 553%, 667% arcane damage.

If either attack hits, the target will be stunned for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns.

The chance for the attack to stun increases with your Physical Power, but it is considered a magical attack and thus is resisted with spell save, rather than physical save.

Damage increases with Spellpower.
talents.name: Eldritch Blow

talents.info_text:
Imbues your shields with arcane power, dealing 27, 37, 44, 51, 56 arcane damage with each melee strike and 19, 26, 31, 35, 39 arcane damage when hit.

The damage will increase with Spellpower.
talents.name: Eldritch Infusion

talents.info_text:
Channel eldritch forces into a ferocious melee attack, hitting the target three times with your shields doing 114%, 137%, 154%, 169%, 182% Nature damage.

If any of the attacks hit, the target will be dazed for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The chance for the attack to daze increases with you Physical Power, but it is considered a magical attack and thus is resisted with spell save, rather than physical save.
talents.name: Eldritch Fury

talents.info_text:
Slam your shield on the ground creating a shockwave.

You perform a melee attack for 201%, 230%, 253%, 272%, 289% Arcane damage against everyone within radius 2, 4, 5, 6, 7.
talents.name: Eldritch Slam

description: Summon stony spikes imbued with various powers.
name: eldritch stone

talents.info_text:
Stony spikes erupt from the ground in a radius 4, 5, 5, 5, 6 cone.

Creatures caught in the area will be cut for 181, 246, 297, 340, 378 Physical damage dealt over 6 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower, and the chance to apply the detrimental effect(s) improves with Spellpower or Physical Power, whichever is greater.
talents.name: Stone Spikes

talents.info_text:
Coats your stone spikes with insidious poison, dealing 144, 195, 235, 269, 299 total nature damage over 6 turns while reducing all healing by 55%, 61%, 65%, 67%, 69%.

The damage increases with Spellpower and the chance to poison and healing reduction increases with either Spellpower or Physical Power, whichever is greater.
talents.name: Poisoned Spikes

talents.info_text:
Imbues your stone spikes with arcane forces, dealing 129, 175, 211, 241, 268 Arcane damage and silencing each target hit for 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

The damage increases with Spellpower and the chance to silence increases with either Spellpower or Physical Power, whichever is greater.
talents.name: Eldritch Spikes

talents.info_text:
Your stone spikes grow in length, instantly dealing 144, 195, 235, 269, 299 Physical damage and disarming targets hit for 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

The damage increases with Spellpower and the chance to disarm increases with either Spellpower or Physical Power, whichever is greater.
talents.name: Impaling Spikes

description: Alchemical control over lightning energies.
name: energy alchemy

talents.info_text:
When you throw your alchemist bombs, you infuse them with lightning damage that can daze your foes.

In addition all lightning damage you do is increased by 8%, 16%, 23%, 28%, 33%.

You cannot have more than one alchemist infusion sustain active at once.
talents.name: Lightning Infusion

talents.info_text:
While Lightning Infusion is active, your bombs energize your golem.

All talents on cooldown on your golem have 37%, 61%, 72%, 78%, 82% chance to be reduced by 1, 1, 1, 1, 2.
talents.name: Dynamic Recharge

talents.info_text:
By crushing an alchemist gem you generate a thunderclap in a cone of radius 3, 5, 7, 8, 10 dealing 91, 123, 148, 170, 189 physical damage and 91, 123, 148, 170, 189 lightning damage.

All creatures caught inside are knocked back and disarmed for 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns.

The duration and damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Thunderclap

talents.info_text:
Infuse your body with lightning energy, bolstering your movement speed by +6%, +10%, +13%, +17%, +20%.

Each turn, a foe within range 2, 3, 3, 4, 4 will be struck by lightning and be dealt 48, 66, 79, 90, 101 Lightning damage.

In addition, damage to your health will energize you.

At the start of each turn in which you have lost at least 200 life (20% of your maximum life) since your last turn, you will gain 87%, 100%, 111%, 119%, 127% of a turn.

The effects increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Living Lightning

description: Magical enhancement of your body.
name: enhancement

talents.info_text:
Engulfs your hands (and weapons) in a sheath of fire, dealing 27, 37, 44, 51, 56 fire damage per melee attack and increasing all fire damage dealt by 9%, 12%, 14%, 16%, 18%.

Each hit will also regenerate 0.50, 1.00, 1.50, 2.00, 2.50 stamina.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fiery Hands

talents.info_text:
Hardens your skin with the power of earth, reducing physical damage taken by 41%, 55%, 67%, 76%, 85% for 10 turns.

Damage reduction will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Earthen Barrier

talents.info_text:
Engulfs your hands (and weapons) in a sheath of lightning, dealing 13, 17, 21, 24, 27 lightning damage with a chance to daze (25%) per melee attack and increasing all lightning damage dealt by 9%, 12%, 14%, 16%, 18%.

Each hit will also regenerate 0.50, 1.00, 1.50, 2.00, 2.50 mana.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shock Hands

talents.info_text:
You concentrate on your inner self, increasing all your stats by 6, 8, 10, 11, 13.

The stat increase will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Inner Power

description: Manipulate gems to turn them into explosive magical bombs.
name: explosive admixtures

talents.info_text:
Imbue an alchemist gem with an explosive charge of mana and throw it.

The gem will explode for 1.0 fire damage.

Each kind of gem will also provide a specific effect.

The damage will improve with better gems and with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Throw Bomb

talents.info_text:
Grants 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100% protection to you, your golem and other friendly creatures against the elemental damage of your own bombs, and against external elemental damage (fire, cold, lightning and acid) by 3%, 6%, 9%, 12%, 15%.

At talent level 5 it also protects against all side effects of your bombs.
talents.name: Alchemist Protection

talents.info_text:
Your alchemist bombs now affect a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 around them.

Explosion damage may increase by 0% (if the explosion is not contained) to 27%, 40%, 61%, 101%, 216% if the area of effect is confined.
talents.name: Explosion Expert

talents.info_text:
Crush together two alchemist gems, making them extremely unstable.

You then throw them to a target area, where they explode on impact, dealing 1.00 physical damage and knocking back any creatures in the blast radius.

Each kind of gem will also provide a specific effect.

The damage will improve with better gems and with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shockwave Bomb

description: Harness the power of fire to burn your foes to ashes.
name: fire

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of fire, setting the target ablaze and doing 211, 287, 346, 396, 441 fire damage over 3 turns.

At level 5, it will create a beam of flames.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Flame

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a cone of flame with radius 4, 5, 6, 7, 8. Any targets caught in the area will suffer Burning Shock, stunning them and dealing 181, 246, 297, 340, 378 fire damage over 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Flameshock

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of fire that moves toward the target and explodes into a flash of fire, doing 204, 277, 334, 382, 425 fire damage in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fireflash

talents.info_text:
Raging flames burn foes and allies alike, doing 55, 75, 91, 104, 115 fire damage in a radius of 5 each turn for 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Inferno

description: Alchemical control over fire.
name: fire alchemy

talents.info_text:
When you throw your alchemist bombs, you infuse them with flames that burn for a few turns.

In addition all fire damage you do is increased by 8%, 16%, 23%, 28%, 33%.

You cannot have more than one alchemist infusion sustain active at once.
talents.name: Flame Infusion

talents.info_text:
Throw a smoke bomb, blocking everyone's line of sight. The smoke dissipates after 7, 10, 12, 13, 15 turns.

If a creature inside is victim of fire burns the smoke will consume instantly, replicating the burns on all foes and increasing its duration by 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns.

Duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Smoke Bomb

talents.info_text:
A furious fire storm rages around the caster, doing 84, 115, 138, 158, 176 fire damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 12, 12, 13, 14, 14 turns.

You closely control the firestorm, preventing it from harming your party members.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fire Storm

talents.info_text:
Turn your body into pure flame, increasing your fire resistance by 30%, 41%, 49%, 57%, 63%, burning any creatures attacking you for 17, 22, 27, 31, 34 fire damage, and projecting 1, 3, 4, 6, 7 random slow-moving fire bolts per turn at targets in sight, doing 48, 66, 79, 90, 100 fire damage with each bolt.

The projectiles safely go through your friends without harming them.

This powerful spell drains 0.10, 0.20, 0.30, 0.40, 0.50 mana while active.

The damage and resistance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Body of Fire

description: Alchemical control over frost.
name: frost alchemy

talents.info_text:
When you throw your alchemist bombs, you infuse them with cold damage that can freeze your foes.

In addition all cold damage you do is increased by 8%, 16%, 23%, 28%, 33%.

You cannot have more than one alchemist infusion sustain active at once.
talents.name: Frost Infusion

talents.info_text:
While Frost Infusion is active, your bombs deposit a layer of ice on your golem for 7, 10, 12, 13, 15 turns when they hit it.

This ice provides your golem with 16, 22, 27, 30, 34 additional armour, melee attacks against it deal 0.0 Cold damage to the attacker, and 50% of its damage is converted to Cold.

The effects increase with your talent level and with the Spellpower and damage modifiers of your golem.
talents.name: Ice Armour

talents.info_text:
Invoke a blast of cold all around you with a radius of 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, doing 181, 246, 297, 340, 378 Cold damage and freezing creatures to the ground for 7, 10, 12, 13, 15 turns.

Affected creatures can still act, but cannot move.

The duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Flash Freeze

talents.info_text:
Turn your body into pure ice, increasing your Cold damage affinity by 7%, 14%, 18%, 22%, 25% and your physical resistance by 30%, 41%, 49%, 57%, 63%.

All direct critical hits (physical, mental, spells) against you have a 17%, 33%, 46%, 56%, 66% lower Critical multiplier (but always do at least normal damage).

The effects increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ice Core

description: Learn to craft and upgrade your golem.
name: golemancy

talents.info_text:
Interact with your golem to check its inventory, talents, …

Note: You can also do that while taking direct control of the golem.
talents.name: Interact with the Golem

talents.info_text:
Take care of your golem:

  • If it is destroyed, you will take some time to reconstruct it (this takes 15 alchemist gems and 20 turns).
  • If it is alive but hurt, you will be able to repair it for 0 (takes 2 alchemist gems). Spellpower, alchemist gem and Golem Power talent all influence the healing done.
talents.name: Refit Golem

description: Learn to craft and upgrade your golem.
name: golemancy

talents.info_text: Improves your golem's proficiency with weapons, increasing its attack and damage.
talents.name: Golem Power

talents.info_text: Improves your golem's armour training, damage resistance, and healing efficiency.
talents.name: Golem Resilience

talents.info_text: You invoke your golem to your side, granting it a temporary melee power increase of 33, 46, 55, 63, 70 for 5 turns.
talents.name: Invoke Golem

talents.info_text: Teleport to your golem, while your golem teleports to your location. Your foes will be confused, and those that were attacking you will have a 40%, 55%, 70%, 85%, 100% chance to target your golem instead.
talents.name: Golem Portal

description: Use the rotting cold doom of the tomb to fell your foes.
name: grave

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of cold that moves toward the target and explodes into a chilly circle of death, doing 204, 277, 334, 382, 425 cold damage in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.

Additionally, when Will o' the Wisp is sustained, minions killed by this spell will spawn Wisps.
talents.name: Chill of the Tomb

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with undead energies. When one of your minions is destroyed while inside your necrotic aura, it has a 45%, 60%, 75%, 90%, 100% chance to create a will o' the wisp.

The will o' the wisp will take a random target in sight and home in on it. When it reaches the target, it will explode for 239, 318, 379, 431, 476 cold damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Will o' the Wisp

talents.info_text:
Cold Flames slowly spread from 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 spots in a radius of 3 around the targeted location. The flames deal 63, 85, 103, 117, 130 cold damage, and have a chance of freezing.

Damage improves with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Cold Flames

talents.info_text:
Vampiric energies fill you; each time you deal damage, you have 28%, 36%, 43%, 48%, 52% chance to heal for 19%, 25%, 28%, 31%, 33% of the damage done.

The absorption percent will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Vampiric Gift

description: Spell talents of the various horrors of the world.
name: horror spells

talents.info_text: Creates a shroud of darkness over a radius 3 area that lasts 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns. The shroud causes 27, 37, 44, 51, 56 darkness damage each turn, reduces light radius by 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, and darkness resistance by 26%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 56% of those within.
talents.name: Abyssal Shroud

talents.info_text: Open a hole in space, summoning an animated blade for 10 turns.
talents.name: Animate Blade

description: Harness the power of ice to freeze and shatter your foes.
name: ice

talents.info_text:
Hurl ice shards at the targets in the selected area. Each shard travels slowly and does 144, 195, 235, 269, 299 ice damage, hitting all adjacent targets on impact.

This spell will never hit the caster.

If the target is wet the damage increases by 30% and the ice freeze chance increases to 50%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ice Shards

talents.info_text:
Blast a wave of cold all around you with a radius of 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, doing 204, 277, 334, 382, 425 cold damage and freezing creatures to the ground for 4 turns.

Affected creatures can still act, but cannot move.

For each affected creature that is also wet the cooldown of Shatter decreases by 2.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Frozen Ground

talents.info_text:
Shatter all frozen targets in your line of sight, doing 234, 318, 384, 439, 488 cold damage.

Depending on the target's rank, there will also be an additional effect:

  • Critters will be instantly killed
  • +50% critical chance against Normal rank
  • +25% critical chance against Elites or Bosses

All affected foes will get the wet effect.

At most, it will affect 4, 5, 7, 8, 10 foes.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shatter

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with Uttercold, increasing all your cold damage by 3.9%, 6.9%, 9.3%, 11%, 13% and ignoring 23%, 37%, 47%, 54%, 59% cold resistance of your targets

In addition you pierce through iceblocks easily, reducing damage absorbed from your attacks by iceblocks by 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%.
talents.name: Uttercold

description: Meta spells alter the working of magic itself.
name: meta

talents.info_text:
Removes up to 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 magical effects (good effects from foes, and bad effects from friends) from the target.

At level 3, it can be targeted.
talents.name: Disperse Magic

talents.info_text:
You learn to finely craft and tune your offensive spells.

You try to carve a hole in spells that affect an area to avoid damaging yourself. The chance of success is 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%.

In addition, you hone your damaging spells to spellshock their targets. Whenever you deal damage with a spell you attempt to spellshock them with 58, 79, 95, 109, 122 more Spellpower than normal. Spellshocked targets suffer a temporary 20% penalty to damage resistances.
talents.name: Spellcraft

talents.info_text: Reduces the cooldown of all spells by 6%, 13%, 20%, 26%, 30%.
talents.name: Quicken Spells

talents.info_text: Your mastery of arcane flows allow you to reset the cooldown of up to 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 of your spells (that don't have a fixed cooldown) of tier 1, 3, 4, 6, 7 or less.
talents.name: Metaflow

description: Gain control over death, eventually turning into a lich.
name: necrosis

talents.info_text: The line between life and death blurs for you; you can only die when you reach -65, -130, -195, -259, -323 life.
talents.name: Blurred Mortality

talents.info_text:
Your target's doom draws near. Its healing factor is reduced by 80%, and will take 117%, 124%, 127%, 129%, 131% of its remaining life (or 847, 1080, 1260, 1413, 1548, whichever is lower) over 10 turns as arcane damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Impending Doom

talents.info_text:
Absorb up to 67%, 73%, 76%, 78%, 80% of the maximum life of each of your necrotic minions (even negative life, possibly destroying them). This will heal you for the greatest amount absorbed.

The healing will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Undeath Link

talents.info_text:
This is your true goal and the purpose of all necromancy - to become a powerful and everliving Lich!

If you are killed while this spell is active, the arcane forces you unleash will be able to rebuild your body into the desired Lichform.

All liches gain the following intrinsics:

  • Poison, cut, and fear immunity.
  • 100% disease and stun resistance.
  • 20% cold and darkness resistance.
  • No need to breathe.
  • Infusions do not work.

Also:

  • At level 1: -3 to all stats, -10% to all resistances. Such meagre devotion!
  • At level 2: Nothing.
  • At level 3: +3 Magic and Willpower, +1 life rating (not retroactive).
  • At level 4: +3 Magic and Willpower, +2 life rating (not retroactive), +10 spell and mental saves, Celestial/Star Fury category (0.7) and 0.1 negative energies regeneration.
  • At level 5: +5 Magic and Willpower, +2 life rating (not retroactive), +10 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 10%, Celestial/Star Fury category (0.9) and 0.5 negative energy regeneration.
  • At level 6: +6 Magic, Willpower and Cunning, +3 life rating (not retroactive), +15 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 15%, Celestial/Star Fury category (1.1) and 1.0 negative energy regeneration.
  • At level 7: Your power becomes overwhelming! +12 Magic, Willpower and Cunning, 60% chance to ignore critical hits, +4 life rating (not retroactive), +35 spell and mental saves, all resistance caps raised by 15%, Celestial/Star Fury category (1.3) and 1.0 negative energy regeneration.

The undead cannot use this talent.

While active, it will drain 4 mana per turn.

Once you die and turn into a Lich you can not invest any more in this talent.
talents.name: Lichform
require: Level 20, Mag 40; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 21, Mag 42; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 22, Mag 44; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 23, Mag 46; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead
Level 24, Mag 48; 'From Death, Life' quest completed and not already undead

description: Create and empower dumb undead minions.
name: necrotic minions

talents.info_text:
Fires powerful undead energies through your necrotic aura. For each recent death that happened inside your aura, you will raise an undead minion (up to 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 minions). These minions will be raised within a cone that extends to the edge of your necrotic aura.

The minions level is your level -5, -2, +1, +3, +5.

Each minion has a chance to be:

Degenerated skeleton warrior: 46%, 26%, 11%, 0%, 0%

Skeleton warrior: 11%, 15%, 19%, 25%, 27%

Armoured skeleton warrior: 1%, 5%, 10%, 15%, 18%

Skeleton archer: 13%, 19%, 17%, 9%, 0%

Skeleton master archer: 0%, 3%, 6%, 10%, 12%

Skeleton mage: 6%, 9%, 11%, 15%, 16%

Ghoul: 18%, 13%, 9%, 5%, 0%

Ghast: 1%, 4%, 7%, 10%, 11%

Ghoulking: 0%, 2%, 6%, 10%, 12%
talents.name: Create Minions

talents.info_text:
Your dark power radiates further as you grow stronger. Increases the radius of your necrotic aura by 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, and reduces the decay rate of your minions outside the aura by 1%, 2%, 3%, 4%, 5%.

At level 3, necrotic minions inside your aura have a 25% chance to refund their soul on death. If a minion turns into a will o' the wisp then the wisp will have that chance instead.
talents.name: Aura Mastery

talents.info_text:
A surge of power radiates to all your minions, increasing their Physical Power, Spellpower and Accuracy by 41, 55, 67, 76, 85, their Armour penetration by 33, 46, 55, 63, 70 and their critical hit chance by 16, 22, 27, 30, 34 for 6 turns.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Surge of Undeath

talents.info_text:
You share your powers with your minions, granting them 55%, 75%, 90%, 103%, 115% of your resistances and saves.

In addition all damage done by your minions to you or your other minions is reduced by 20%, 40%, 60%, 80%, 100%.

The effect will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Dark Empathy

description: Manipulate darkness itself to slaughter your foes.
name: nightfall

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of darkness, doing 166, 226, 272, 311, 346 darkness damage.

At level 3, it will create a beam of shadows.

At level 5, none of your Nightfall spells will hurt your minions.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Invoke Darkness

talents.info_text:
Dark fumes erupt from the ground for 5 turns. Any creature entering the circle will receive either a bane of confusion or a bane of blindness.

Only one bane can affect a creature.

Banes last for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns, and also deal 27, 37, 44, 51, 56 darkness damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Circle of Death

talents.info_text:
Invoke a cone dealing 166, 226, 272, 311, 346 darkness damage in a radius of 4, 6, 7, 8, 9. Any creatures caught inside must make check against their Mental Save or be knocked back 4 grids away.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Fear the Night

talents.info_text:
Invoke a ball of darkness that deals 204, 277, 334, 382, 425 darkness damage in a radius of 1. Every creature hit will start to become closer to death, reducing their global speed by 9%, 19%, 29%, 39%, 48%.

Necrotic minions' damage against those creatures is increased by 29%, 37%, 42%, 47%, 51%.

The effects last for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns.

The damage done and the minions' damage increase will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Rigor Mortis

description: Spell abilities of the various objects of the world.
name: object spells

talents.info_text: Removes up to 1, 3, 4, 6, 7 detrimental magical effects and empowers you with arcane energy for ten turns, increasing spellpower and spell save by 5 plus 5 per effect removed.
talents.name: Arcane Supremacy

talents.info_text: Alter the flow of energies through a staff.
talents.name: Command Staff

talents.info_text:
You absorb latent cold around you, turning into an ice elemental - a shivgoroth - for 6, 7, 9, 10, 12 turns.

While transformed, you do not need to breathe, gain access to the Ice Storm talent at level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, gain 76%, 100%, 100%, 100%, 100% resistance to cuts and stuns, gain 38%, 50%, 50%, 50%, 50% cold resistance, and all cold damage heals you for 126%, 150%, 150%, 150%, 150% of the damage done.

The power will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shivgoroth Form

description: Talents of the various entities of the world.
name: other

talents.info_text: Try to confuse the target's mind for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.
talents.name: Mind Disruption

talents.info_text:
Condenses ambient water on a target, inflicting 57, 84, 107, 127, 145 cold damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Water Bolt

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of fire, setting the target ablaze and doing 129, 175, 211, 241, 268 fire damage over 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Flame Bolt

talents.info_text:
Hurl ice shard at the target dealing 99, 135, 162, 186, 207 ice damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ice Bolt

talents.info_text:
Projects a bolt of pure blight, doing 129, 175, 211, 241, 268 blight damage.

This spell has an improved critical strike chance of +9.73%, +17%, +23%, +29%, +34%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blight Bolt

talents.info_text:
Condenses ambient water on a target, inflicting 48, 70, 88, 104, 118 cold damage and stunning it for 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower
talents.name: Water Jet

talents.info_text:
Fires a blast of void energies that slowly travel to their target, dealing 174, 236, 285, 326, 362 arcane damage on impact.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Void Blast

talents.info_text: Call upon the forces of nature to cure your body of 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 poisons and diseases.
talents.name: Restoration

talents.info_text:
Call upon the forces of nature to regenerate your body for 21, 27, 32, 35, 39 life every turn for 10 turns.

The life healed increases with Spellpower.
talents.name: Regeneration

talents.info_text: Fire a slow bolt of a random element for 246, 348, 426, 492, 551 damage. Damage increases with the magic stat.
talents.name: Elemental Bolt

talents.info_text:
Summons a small raging volcano for 5, 7, 8, 9, 10 turns. Every turn, it will fire a molten boulder towards up to 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 of your foes, dealing 28, 38, 45, 52, 58 fire and 28, 38, 45, 52, 58 physical damage.

The damage will scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Volcano

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a fist of stone, doing 166, 226, 272, 311, 346 physical damage and knocking the target back 3 grids.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Strike

talents.info_text:
Corrosive fumes rise from the ground doing 34, 46, 56, 64, 71 acid damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Corrosive Vapour

talents.info_text:
Engulf yourself in a surge of mana, quickly restoring 18, 22, 26, 29, 32 mana every turn for 10 turns.

The mana restored will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Manaflow

talents.info_text:
Exhale a wave of dark fire with radius 4, 6, 7, 8, 9. Any non demon caught in the area will take 130, 170, 199, 224, 245 fire damage, and flames will be left dealing a further 30, 39, 46, 52, 57 each turn. Demons will be healed for the same amount.

The damage will increase with your Strength Stat.
talents.name: Infernal Breath

talents.info_text:
Engulfs your hands (and weapons) in a sheath of frost, dealing 13, 18, 21, 25, 27 cold damage per melee attack and increasing all cold damage by 9%, 12%, 14%, 16%, 18%.

The effects will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Frost Hands

talents.info_text:
Use arcane forces to summon 3, 4, 4, 4, 5 meteors that fall to the ground within range 2 of the target.

Each meteor smashes everything within radius 2, dealing 91, 123, 148, 170, 189 fire and 91, 123, 148, 170, 189 physical damage to creatures other than yourself, while liquefying some of the terrain into lava for 8 turns.

The damage increases with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Meteor Rain

talents.info_text:
Grab a target and pull it next to you, covering it with frost while reducing its movement speed by 50% for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns.

The ice will also deal 99, 135, 162, 186, 207 cold damage.

The damage and chance to slow will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Frost Grab

talents.info_text: Designate a target as a martyr for 10 turns. When the martyr deals damage, it also damages itself for 20%, 31%, 38%, 42%, 46% of the damage dealt.
talents.name: Martyrdom

talents.info_text:
A furious ice storm rages around the caster ,doing 63, 85, 103, 117, 130 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 11, 13, 14, 16, 17 turns.

It has a 25% chance to freeze damaged targets.

If the target is wet the damage increases by 30% and the freeze chance increases to 50%.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Ice Storm

talents.info_text:
Emits a necrotic aura, sustaining your undead minions in a radius of 2. Minions outside the radius will lose 10% life per turn.

Any creature you or your minions kill within your aura will be absorbed as a soul that can be used to raise minions.

Retch from your ghouls will also heal you, even if you are not undead.
talents.name: Necrotic Aura

talents.info_text:
The husk self-destructs, destroying itself and generating a blast of shadows in a radius of 4, doing 60, 150, 300, 450, 550 darkness damage.

This spell is only usable when the husk's master is dead.
talents.name: Self-destruction

talents.info_text:
Conjures 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 missile-shaped rocks that you target individually at any target or targets in range. Each missile deals 72, 98, 118, 135, 150 physical damage, and an additional 12, 16, 20, 22, 25 bleeding damage every turn for 5 turns.

At talent level 5, you can conjure one additional missile.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Earthen Missiles

talents.info_text: You fade from sight, making you invulnerable until the beginning of your next turn.
talents.name: Fade

talents.info_text: Teleports you within a small range.
talents.name: Phase Door

talents.info_text: With blinding speed you suddenly appear next to a target up to 10 spaces away and attack for 144%, 167%, 184%, 199%, 212% damage.
talents.name: Blindside

talents.info_text:
Strikes the target with a spark of lightning doing 48, 65, 78, 90, 100 to 144, 195, 235, 269, 299 damage.

The damage will increase with the Magic stat
talents.name: Shadow Lightning

talents.info_text:
Bathes the target in flames doing 99, 135, 162, 186, 207 damage

The damage will increase with the Magic stat
talents.name: Shadow Flames

talents.info_text: When a shadow is hit and killed, there is a 50% chance it will reform unhurt.
talents.name: Reform

talents.info_text: Spell damage done to it ripples in radius 4 doing 160% arcane damage.
talents.name: Arcane Amplification Drone Effect

talents.info_text:
Fire a blast of darkness at an enemy dealing 219, 298, 359, 411, 456 damage and destroying any walls in radius 3 around them.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Crumble

talents.info_text:
Evolve 5 allies within radius 10 in random ways for 5 turns.

Speed: Increases global speed by 28%, 38%, 46%, 52%, 58%.

Form: Increases all stats by 16, 22, 27, 30, 34.

Power: Increases all damage by 13%, 17%, 21%, 24%, 27%.
talents.name: Twisted Evolution

description: Control the power of tricks and illusions.
name: phantasm

talents.info_text:
Creates a globe of pure light within a radius of 6, 8, 9, 10, 11 that illuminates the area.

At level 3, it also blinds all who see it (except the caster) for 3, 3, 3, 4, 4 turns.

At level 4, it also deals 129, 175, 211, 241, 268 light damage.
talents.name: Illuminate

talents.info_text:
The caster's image blurs, granting a 18, 31, 42, 52, 62 bonus to Defense.

The bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blur Sight

talents.info_text:
The caster is surrounded by a phantasmal shield. If hit in melee, the shield will deal 84, 114, 138, 158, 175 light damage to the attacker.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Phantasmal Shield

talents.info_text:
The caster fades from sight, granting 33, 46, 55, 63, 70 bonus to invisibility.

Beware — you should take off your light, or you will still be easily spotted.

As you become invisible, you fade out of phase with reality. All your damage is reduced by 70%.

This powerful spell constantly drains your mana (2 per turn) while active.

The invisibility bonus will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Invisibility

description: Invoke and control shades.
name: shades

talents.info_text:
Surround your minions in a veil of darkness. The darkness will teleport them to you, and grant them 61%, 75%, 87%, 96%, 105% evasion for 5 turns.

The evasion chance will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shadow Tunnel

talents.info_text:
Reaches through the shadows into quieter places, summoning 2, 3, 5, 6, 8 harmless creatures.

Those creatures are then cursed with a Curse of Hate, making all hostile foes try to kill them.

If the summoned creatures are killed by hostile foes, you have 70% chance to gain a soul.
talents.name: Curse of the Meek

talents.info_text:
Through the shadows, you forge a temporary copy of yourself, existing for 4, 6, 7, 8, 10 turns.

The copy possesses your exact talents and stats, has 57%, 63%, 67%, 69%, 71% life and deals 76%, 84%, 88%, 92%, 94% damage.
talents.name: Forgery of Haze

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with Frostdusk, increasing all your darkness and cold damage by 3.9%, 6.9%, 9.3%, 11%, 13%, and ignoring 17%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% of the darkness resistance of your targets.

In addition, all darkness damage you take heals you for 18%, 35%, 47%, 55%, 60% of the damage.
talents.name: Frostdusk

description: Harness the power of magical staves.
name: staff combat

talents.info_text:
Channel raw mana through your staff, projecting a bolt of your staff's damage type, doing 78%, 94%, 106%, 116%, 125% staff damage.

The bolt will only hurt hostile targets, and pass safely through friendly ones.

This attack always has a 100% chance to hit, and ignores the target's Armour.

When projecting a bolt with your staff its damage modifier is increased by 20%.
talents.name: Channel Staff

talents.info_text: Increases Physical Power by 15, 30, 45, 60, 75 and increases weapon damage by 27%, 38%, 47%, 54%, 61% when using staves.
talents.name: Staff Mastery

talents.info_text: Adopt a defensive posture, increasing your Defense and Armour by 13, 17, 21, 24, 27.
talents.name: Defensive Posture

talents.info_text:
Hit a target for 127%, 138%, 147%, 154%, 161% melee damage and stun it for 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 turns.

Stun chance will improve with Spellpower.

At level 5, this attack cannot miss.
talents.name: Blunt Thrust

description: Harness the power of the stone to protect and destroy.
name: stone

talents.info_text:
Conjures 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 missile-shaped rocks that you target individually at any target or targets in range. Each missile deals 72, 98, 118, 135, 150 physical damage, and an additional 12, 16, 20, 22, 25 bleeding damage every turn for 5 turns.

At talent level 5, you can conjure one additional missile.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Earthen Missiles

talents.info_text:
You root yourself into the earth, and transform your flesh into stone. While this spell is sustained, you may not move, and any forced movement will end the effect.

Your stone form and your affinity with the earth while the spell is active has the following effects:

  • Reduces the cooldown of Earthen Missiles, Pulverizing Auger, Earthquake, and Mudslide by 21%, 29%, 34%, 37%, 39%.
  • Grants 55%, 75%, 90%, 103%, 115% Fire Resistance, 33%, 46%, 55%, 63%, 70% Lightning Resistance, 13%, 17%, 21%, 24%, 27% Acid Resistance, and 15%, 30%, 45%, 60%, 75% Stun Resistance.

Resistances scale with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Body of Stone

talents.info_text:
Causes a violent earthquake that deals 55, 75, 91, 104, 115 physical damage in a radius of 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 each turn for 4, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns, and potentially stuns any and all creatures it affects.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Earthquake

talents.info_text:
Concentrate on maintaining a Crystalline Focus, increasing all your physical damage by 3.9%, 6.9%, 9.3%, 11%, 13% and ignoring 17%, 28%, 37%, 44%, 50% physical resistance of your targets.

Also raises your physical and magical saves by 7, 15, 22, 30, 37.
talents.name: Crystalline Focus

description: Alchemical control over stone and gems.
name: stone alchemy

talents.info_text:
Extract magical gems from metal weapons and armours. At this skill level you can work with:

  • Iron
  • Steel
  • Dwarven-steel
  • Stralite
  • Voratun
talents.name: Extract Gems

talents.info_text:
Imbue a body armour with a gem (up to tier 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), granting it additional powers.

You can only imbue items once, and it is permanent.
talents.name: Imbue Item

talents.info_text: Crush 5 alchemist gems into dust to mark impassable terrain next to you. You immediately enter it and appear on the other side of the obstacle, up to 16, 20, 24, 28, 30 grids away.
talents.name: Gem Portal

talents.info_text:
Touch your foe and turn it to stone for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns.

Stoned creatures are unable to act or regen life, and are very brittle.

If a stoned creature is hit by an attack that deals more than 30% of its life, it will shatter and be destroyed.

Stoned creatures are highly resistant to fire and lightning, and somewhat resistant to physical attacks.

At level 3 the touch will become a beam.

This spell may fail against creatures resistant to being stunned, that are specifically immune to stoning, or certain bosses.
talents.name: Stone Touch

description: Manipulate gems, and imbue their powers into other objects.
name: stone alchemy

talents.info_text:
Carve 40 to 80 alchemist gems out of a natural gemstone.

Alchemist gems are used for many other spells, and each gem type creates a different effect.
talents.name: Create Alchemist Gems

description: Harness the power of the storm to incinerate your foes.
name: storm

talents.info_text:
Lightning emanates from you in a circular wave with radius 3, 4, 5, 5, 6, doing 48, 65, 78, 90, 100 to 144, 195, 235, 269, 299 lightning damage and possibly dazing anyone affected (75% chance).

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Nova

talents.info_text:
Conjures up a bolt of lightning, doing 68, 92, 111, 127, 142 to 204, 277, 334, 382, 425 lightning damage and dazing the target for 3 turns.

If the target resists the daze effect it is instead shocked, which halves stun/daze/pin resistance, for 5 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shock

talents.info_text:
Each time one of your lightning spells dazes a target, it has a 37%, 45%, 52%, 60%, 67% chance to creates a chain reaction that summons a mighty Hurricane that lasts for 10 turns around the target with a radius of 2, 3, 3, 3, 3.

Each turn, the afflicted creature and all creatures around it will take 35, 48, 58, 67, 74 to 106, 145, 175, 200, 222 lightning damage.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Hurricane

talents.info_text:
Surround yourself with a Tempest, increasing all your lightning damage by 2%, 4%, 6%, 8%, 10% and ignoring 23%, 37%, 47%, 54%, 59% lightning resistance of your targets.

Your Lightning and Chain Lightning spells also gain a 13%, 27%, 40%, 54%, 67% chance to daze, and your Thunderstorm spell gains a 6%, 13%, 20%, 27%, 33% chance to daze.
talents.name: Tempest

description: The school of time manipulation.
name: temporal

talents.info_text: Project a bolt of time distortion, decreasing the target's global speed by 12%, 24%, 36%, 48%, 60% and all projectiles it fires by 57%, 76%, 90%, 90%, 90% for 7 turns.
talents.name: Congeal Time

talents.info_text:
This intricate spell instantly erects a time shield around the caster, preventing any incoming damage and sending it forward in time.

Once either the maximum damage (383, 503, 597, 675, 745) is absorbed, or the time runs out (6, 8, 9, 11, 12 turns), the stored damage will return as a temporal restoration field over time (5 turns).

Each turn the restoration field is active, you get healed for 10% of the absorbed damage (Aegis Shielding talent affects the percentage).

While under the effect of Time Shield, all newly applied magical, physical and mental effects will have their durations reduced by 43%, 46%, 49%, 52%, 55%.

The shield's max absorption will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Time Shield

talents.info_text:
Removes the target from the flow of time for 10, 12, 14, 15, 17 turns. In this state, the target can neither act nor be harmed.

Time does not pass at all for the target, no talents will cooldown, no resources will regen, and so forth.

The duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Time Prison

talents.info_text: Increases the caster's global speed by 14%, 28%, 41%, 52%, 63%.
talents.name: Essence of Speed

description: Take on the defining aspects of an Undead Drake.
name: undead drake

talents.info_text:
You revel in death, devouring the souls of your victims. Whenever you inflict damage to a target, you deal an additional 13, 18, 21, 25, 27 darkness damage.

Additionally, you gain 1, 1, 1, 2, 2 souls whenever you score a kill.

The damage will scale with the highest of your spell or mind power and can only occur up to 15 times per turn.
talents.name: Raze

talents.info_text:
Release a cloud of deadly miasma over a targeted area, dealing 27, 37, 44, 51, 56 darkness damage to all units inside it with a 20% chance of inflicting a disease that will do blight damage and weaken either Constitution, Strength or Dexterity for 4, 5, 6, 6, 7 turns.

The damage will scale with the highest of your spell or mind power.
talents.name: Infectious Miasma

talents.info_text:
You surge with a life draining energy for 4, 5, 5, 6, 6 turns.

While the effect lasts, you heal yourself for 7%, 9%, 10%, 11%, 13% of all damage you deal.
talents.name: Vampiric Surge

talents.info_text:
You breathe a wave of deathly miasma in a cone of radius 5, 7, 8, 9, 10. Any target caught in the area will take 195, 254, 298, 335, 366 darkness damage over 4 turns and receive either a bane of confusion or a bane of blindness for 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Magic, and the critical chance is based on your Spell crit rate.
talents.name: Necrotic Breath

description: Harness the power of water to drown your foes.
name: water

talents.info_text:
Glacial fumes rise from the ground, doing 34, 46, 56, 64, 71 cold damage in a radius of 3 each turn for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns.

Creatures that are wet will take 30% more damage and have 15% chance to get frozen.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Glacial Vapour

talents.info_text:
Condenses ambient water on a target, freezing it for 3, 5, 6, 7, 8 turns and damaging it for 172, 263, 352, 443, 537.

If this is used on a friendly target the cooldown is halved.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Freeze

talents.info_text:
A wall of water rushes out from the caster with an initial radius of 1, increasing by 1 per turn to a maximum radius of 4, 4, 5, 5, 5, doing 31, 43, 51, 59, 65 cold damage and 31, 43, 51, 59, 65 physical damage to all inside, as well as knocking back targets each turn.

The tidal wave lasts for 6, 7, 8, 8, 9 turns.

All creatures hit gain the wet effect, which reduces their stun/freeze immunity by half and interacts with other cold spells.

The damage and duration will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Tidal Wave

talents.info_text:
You absorb latent cold around you, turning into an ice elemental - a shivgoroth - for 6, 7, 9, 10, 12 turns.

While transformed, you do not need to breathe, gain access to the Ice Storm talent at level 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, gain 76%, 100%, 100%, 100%, 100% resistance to cuts and stuns, gain 38%, 50%, 50%, 50%, 50% cold resistance, and all cold damage heals you for 126%, 150%, 150%, 150%, 150% of the damage done.

The power will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shivgoroth Form

description: Harness the power of wildfire to burn your foes to ashes.
name: wildfire

talents.info_text:
A wave of fire emanates from you with a radius of 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, knocking back anything caught inside and setting them ablaze, doing 129, 175, 211, 241, 268 fire damage over 3 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Blastwave

talents.info_text:
Your Flame, Flameshock, Fireflash and Blastwave spells leave a burning wake on the ground, burning all within for 38, 51, 61, 70, 78 fire damage for 4 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Burning Wake

talents.info_text:
When your Burning Wake talent is active, your Inferno and Burning Wake effects have a 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50% chance, each turn, to remove a status effect (physical, magical, curse or hex) from the targets.

If the target is hostile, it will remove a beneficial effect.

If the target is friendly, it will remove a detrimental effect (but still burn).
talents.name: Cleansing Flames

talents.info_text: Surround yourself with Wildfire, increasing all your fire damage by 3.9%, 6.9%, 9.3%, 11%, 13%, ignoring 23%, 37%, 47%, 54%, 59% fire resistance of your targets and reducing self-inflicted fire damage by 21%, 42%, 63%, 84%, 100%.
talents.name: Wildfire
